results.name: Nftfy
results.description: Nftfy is a Decentralized Application (DApp) that fractionalizes Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), generating ERC20-compliant Fractions fully backed by the NFTs.
results.fullDescription:
Nftfy is a Decentralized Application (DApp) that fractionalizes Non-Fungible Tokens, generating ERC20-compliant Fractions fully backed by the NFTs.

Once your NFT is staked in our Smart Contracts and the Fractionalization process is completed, you receive one million Fractions of your NFT and get instant access to them in your wallet. From that moment, you will be able to make your own Initial Dex Offering, by creating a Liquidity Bootstrapping Pool using Balancer protocol to provide liquidity to your Fractions. In that manner, you create a whole new market and allow anyone to trade your Fractions in the open market. It is a simple, instant, and trustless way of sharing ownership of NFTs.

$NFTFY is the token of the protocol and can be farmed by providing liquidity to different pools containing Fractions and $NFTFY.

results.name: DRC Vault
results.description: DRC Vault is a secure non-custodial and 100% decentralized application created specifically for DRC holders to securely store their DRC tokens.
results.fullDescription:
DRC Vault is a secure non-custodial and 100% decentralized application created specifically for DRC holders. DRC tokens held in the DRC Vault remain completely under the user’s control and ownership, with nobody else able to access the funds.

The DRC Vault features an intuitive interface allowing easy deposits and withdrawals, a leaderboard and performance statistics. Additional benefits may be available to the DRC Vault users in the future.

results.name: Eswap.tube
results.description: Eswap.tube is developed to solve the problems DEX currently face
results.fullDescription:
Eswap.tube is an innovative DEX currently being developed to solve the problems DEX currently face. The Ewap protocol is a sub-extension of the Quatro Network and neuro-links the other protocols within the network. It is created using ERC20 smart contract as its base technology, with tweaked up DeFi services to suit users and investors.Eswap protocol will enable you to instantly swap crypto tokens from your Dapps wallet service provider. No KYC or registration process is needed, no deposits are also required to make swaps. Execution of smart contracts in a simplistic form, is the bed- rock of the buy/sell process within Eswap.Eswap will apply a safe liquidity protocol to finance the trade ecosystem within the plat- form. Users will be allowed to provide liquidity in pairs directly through their wallets without any form of registrations.

Liquidity providers will earn a 0.4% commission per transactions carried out on the Eswap platform. This is one of the most highly incentivized liquidity pool out there on the market.The Eswap team will activate liquidity mining of several pairs. These are also referred to as farms. These can be entered into through a few simple clicks, users can stake their crypto tokens in the Eswap platform. We give users a perfect alternative for mining tokens. Within these liquidity mines, returns on investments will be paid in tube2 tokens. Eswap also adopts a constant product market maker (AMM), AMM is based on the function x*y=k, which determines the price range of two tokens based on the available quan- tity (liquidity) of each token. To maintain a constant product K, when the supply of tokens X increases, the supply of tokens Y will correspondingly decrease, and vice versa.)

results.name: CosmoBugs
results.description: CosmoBugs - Enjoy collecting!
results.fullDescription:
At the Early Days of the CosmoBugs Era

In 2020, scientists have discovered the traces of life on Venus! The news on that matter just blew up all the patterns, by which we lived before, and found its expression in contemporary art. Various crypto artists in 50 locations around the world were simultaneously covered with a shock wave of creative inspiration. Having united in a single team, they created the CosmoBugs collection of NFT-artworks.

CosmoBugs is an almost real story in the unique digital paintings format telling about the living forms hidden from humans on other planets and in extrasolar stellar systems. The artists painted bugs and other insects inhabiting the endless space. They possess incomprehensible superpowers, but they also know how to love and hate, express self-confidence and have doubts, feel the same way that we, intelligent inhabitants of the blue planet, do. The era of CosmoBugs has already started, and each of us turned out to be its contemporary...

results.name: Fei Protocol
results.description: The Fei system and software is an autonomous system of smart contract
results.fullDescription:
The Fei system and software (the “Fei Protocol”) is an autonomous system of smart contracts on the Ethereum Blockchain that permits, among other things, the generation of Fei, transactions using smart contracts, and lending and borrowing of cryptocurrencies.

FEI uses a new kind of stablecoin mechanism called direct incentives. It is more capital efficient, has a fair distribution, and is fully decentralized. The protocol uses the value it controls to maintain liquid secondary markets.

results.name: Billion Dollar Market Cap
results.description: It consists of a 1920×1080 canvas where users can purchase a minimum block of 10×10 pixels and upload any piece of art.
results.fullDescription:
Billion Dollar Market Cap is the first digital product developed by the iUPixel team. It consists of a 1920×1080 canvas where users can purchase a minimum block of 10×10 pixels and upload any piece of art. 

nspired by The Million Dollar Homepage, a website conceived in 2005 by Alex Tew, a student from Wiltshire, England, to raise money for his university education, we envisioned Billion Dollar Market Cap, as the instrument to raise money to deliver a World Class Gaming Experience, called PixEarth. It is about time to own a new generation pixel on the WEB3.

There are only 2,073,600 pixels in the BDMC canvas and each one stores an image (or a portion of an image) using IPFS Tech, and has it’s representation on the Ethereum blockchain through an NFT.

We create a collaborative canvas, no matter who you are, you can participate in this evolving free real estate. Be a part of the history of the Blockchain, customize your own piece and unleash your creativity once and forever.

results.name: SWAPP Protocol
results.description: SWAPP Protocol is a token that can be used to receive rewards. It is ERC20 and BSC based. SWAPP tokens are also used as the form of rewards in the Swapp App.
results.fullDescription:
SWAPP is making it so that each person can control their own data. It's good for people because they will be in control. We are changing the way that data companies work by using a blockchain to make it better and more secure. As more people start to use this, the price of tokens will go up and give them money to buy what they want. SWAPP is a new way to sell your data. It puts the power in your hands. You can say no or yes to who has access to your data. The company that wants your data, to show you ads, use your data for retargeting campaigns has to pay you for it.

SWAPP Protocol is a Multi-Chain smart Contract that has been launched on Ethereum (ERC-20) and Binance Smart Chain (BEP-20).

SWAPP is a decentralized, fairly launched, ETH and BNB paired utility token used to both facilitate yield farming rewards in the SWAPP DeFi platform as well as serve as the form of rewards within the SWAPP smartphone app and browser extensions.

- The DeFi Launch - The initial purpose of SWAPP is to create a thriving DeFi ecosystem consisting of token holders who can participate in various forms of yield farming and who will ultimately become founding users of the forthcoming

SWAPP mobile app.

- The SWAPP Mobile App - Upon launch of the subsequent SWAPP mobile app, users will then enjoy powerful, new features including turn-key data monetization and privacy-enhancing capabilities.

Where Can I buy SWAPP?

SWAPP can be bought in UniSwap and PancakeSwap decentralized exchanges. Currently, ERC-20 version of tokens could be STAKED on Swapp . We are working to launch more Cross-chain pools for staking BEP-20 and other upcoming chains.

results.name: Plenty
results.description: Trade and earn with Plenty, the leading DEX/AMM on Tezos. Featuring stable and volatile liquidity pools, plus a bridge from Ethereum & Polygon.
results.fullDescription:
Plenty is a decentralized exchange on Tezos that offers a seamless trading experience. Users can trade, earn, govern and build on the platform. Plenty features both stable and volatile liquidity pools, enables near-zero slippage trades and easy bridging from Ethereum and Polygon.

Plenty's ve (vote-escrow) system deviates from the standard vote escrow rules of Curve by implementing three modified economic principles. Firstly, the math of the original two principles of ve(3,3) has been modified to allow for decent incentives for protocols that join the Tezos DeFi ecosystem at a later moment. Secondly, weekly emissions are adjusted as a percentage of the circulating supply, and the real emission that users receive is mathematically related to a base emission. Lastly, the locked PLY supply is tokenized as vePLY NFTs, which are transferable and can be traded on secondary markets. This allows for more efficient use of capital, and solves the capital inefficiency problem of ve assets in other DeFi protocols like Curve.

results.description: BTC365 is the most revolutionary bitcoin sportsbook and casino platform, fully licensed and regulated with satisfied customers globally.
results.fullDescription: BTC365 is the most revolutionary bitcoin sportsbook and casino platform, fully licensed and regulated with satisfied customers globally. We offer the best odds simply because our players are all entitled to double their bets on our Dual Sportsbook and Esports platform. Players can enjoy pre-game and live crypto betting on a huge range of exciting sports such is NBA, NFL, Top 5 soccer Leagues, with over 100,000 matches monthly. BTC365 covers all your favourite games, Baccarat, Blackjack, Roulette, Video Poker, Slots and our Original In-house game. Players can choose from over 100 live table games, including playing on multi-tables to double your thrill and winnings!  The best about our community is, all our players are also a stakeholder of BTC365. results.name: TopBidder
results.description: TopBidder is a radical auction protocol for NFTs
results.fullDescription:
TopBidder is a radical auction protocol based on ERC721 standard. It adopts the theory of Radical Market and implements a crypto vickery commons’(rNFT) production and auction mechanism. Every rNFT has a self-pricing mechanism with bonding curve model

The artist can earn 50% of the premium when a bidder bid with a higher price to obtain the NFT. So they become the shareholder of their artworks. And the former NFT owner can earn 30% of the premium as subsidy

The bidders can earn $BID token when they bid the certain artworks

results.name: Universe.XYZ
results.description: To provide a system that doesn’t live off the backs of artists and creates a protocol for sustainable ecosystems for artists and fans alike.
results.fullDescription:
Creative cosmic dust exists all around us, the unifying force of XYZ is what governs the creative cosmic dust. XYZ in their wisdom brings order to the Universe through governance of a Decentralized Autonomous Organization. The Universe Protocol.

Initially there are two main functions of the Universe Protocol: the first is a novel method for creating new Collections, and the second is auctioning off those Collections. The xyzDAO governs the parameters of the Universe Protocol functions.

The Universe Protocol allows you to launch your own community-driven content backed by social tools, media services, and content distribution as well as tokens, games, and finance.

The Universe Protocol is a community bootstrapping engine. It's designed to embed community building mechanics into the way you mint and monetize NFTs. You can transform NFTs from standalone objects to a Franchise of Collections.

Now it's your turn:

· Create your own state, which will be headed by your own unique president.

· Develop the economy, politics, the army and the people of your country.

· Interact with the states of other participants: trade, fight, conclude diplomatic agreements.

Earn USDT

Wars, the development of production, trade, the level of economic development of the country - your source of USDT. For each military victory, your wallet will receive tokens. The higher the level of development of the state is the more USDT the system charges you.

results.name: SpookySwap
results.description: SpookySwap is the leading AMM on Fantom, utilizing the chain’s low fees and fast transaction times to create a seamless swapping experience.
results.fullDescription:
SpookySwap is an automated market-making (AMM) decentralized exchange (DEX) for the Fantom Opera network. Different from other DEXs, we're invested in building a strong foundation with our BOO token as a governance token, diverse farms, grants to encourage a healthy ecology of other Fantom projects, and user-centered service.   

Since its launch in April 2021, Spooky has:

  • Earned endorsement and support from Fantom Foundation
  • Passed 6 proposals with the community with BOO as the governance token
  • Held airdrop event with Alchemix, Alpha Finance Labs
  • Added official WOOFY sponsored farm
  • Established partnership with Popsicle
  • Maintained the lowest swap fee, and most diverse farms on the Fantom network

results.fullDescription: The Chrono.tech ecosystem consists of a suite of blockchain products and services. 100% of the revenues generated by these will be used to buy back TIME and distribute it to users who stake their tokens.

results.name: glia.icu
results.description: 256 Color Text Art on Chain in neural structure since 2018
results.fullDescription:
Since 2018.  GLIA Tokens live Entirely on the ETH Blockchain on the ledger

  • Visit our DAPP to create your own tokens in our custom editor/importer and/or hang out chat with other users.
  • Check out our YouTube Tutorials and Previews
  • No two tokens can be the same, hashed & validated on chain - cost more to mint than most NFTs!
  • 256 Color ANSI/Text art with historical value dating to 1980's, no floppy needed - data is stored on chain!
  • Tokens can be completely decoded (open sourced and published)  and rendered from blockchain. Art is also viewable in a computer  terminal as its text stored on chain, not images on a file system, like  many NFTS.
  • Won't cease to exist unless ETH ceases to exist.   Censorship resistant.
  • Tokens have permission based Neural Network Meta-Properties linking structure: this lets you do cool stuff with them!

results.name: Arken Finance
results.description: Arken Finance abstracts DeFi complexity, enabling developers to create applications and helping traders navigate across multi-chain with ease and efficiency
results.fullDescription: Arken Finance is the Abstraction Layer that abstracts the complexity of DeFi and multi-chain. More chains with even more diverse technology lead to even more complex software development and user experience. Arken built the Abstraction Layers that live between and across L1, L2, and protocols layers. The Technology Abstraction Layer helps abstract the protocols/chains incompatibility while the User Experience Abstraction Layer helps unified the user experience across multiple chains/dApps and combined them into even more powerful Trading Tools.

results.name: RAMP DEFI
results.description: Multi-task Your Crypto Assets | Stake your crypto assets, earn high yield and unlock liquidity - all at the same time.
results.fullDescription:
RAMP DEFI is an optimized collateralized stablecoin lending platform that helps users leverage the full value of their crypto assets by unlocking stablecoin liquidity and earning high yields at the same time within Binance Smart Chain and Polygon, with new blockchain networks including Ethereum, Solana, and Polkadot to be integrated in the near future.

Crypto-asset owners can deposit collateral assets for high yields, borrow rUSD stablecoin that can be used as cross-chain liquidity while earning net positive yields, thereby extracting liquidity while maintaining asset productivity. With this, they would no longer have their capital tied up in illiquid asset ownership positions while achieving maximum capital efficiency.

results.name: Ember Fund
results.description: Invest like a cryptocurrency hedge fund
results.fullDescription: Ember Fund is the first mobile app that allows anyone in the world access to institutional grade investment management in a fully non-custodial way. Our mission is to take investment products billion dollar hedge funds use and deliver it to the world through crypto-rails in a way that preserves the ethos of cryptocurrencies. We don’t store sensitive information and all transactions are recorded on public blockchains, meaning we are permissionless, censorship-resistant, completely transparent and fully decentralized.

results.name: GazeTV
results.description: GazeTV is an innovative social entertainment platform with built-in reward functions, empowering creators and audiences to interact and grow with one another.
results.fullDescription: GazeTV is a decentralized blockchain-powered social entertainment platform with built-in incentives and reward functions. The GAZE tokenized ecosystem is built to empower creators to tailor their content and be awarded for their work, and audiences to reward creators and engage with video content a whole new way. GazeTV leverages blockchain fundamentals and the GAZE token to tackle this challenge by letting users compensate creators based on their own preferences and tastes. Creators can track rewards and viewership, by earning, staking and swapping GAZE tokens, resulting in faster content-revenue distribution. GazeTV converts “users” into a global, engaged community. The platform also offers an Automated Content Synchronization feature for creators to quickly and easily bring their content from other platforms onto their GazeTV channel. Creators can synchronize their content from Youtube, Facebook, and more than 455 million WordPress websites seamlessly.

results.name: dCOLLECT
results.description: Historical NFT packs based on the most famous events, people and documents in History. ERC-1155 tokens that will be used for staking Aspen rewards.
results.fullDescription:
Aspen is a decentralized application development company. We construct layers on-top of current open source protocols to enable a higher degree of user accessibility to financial options.

Currently Aspen's focus is on a three year roll out of applications that build upon each other. Beginning with the a dAPP for NFTs (non-fungible tokens) called dCOLLECT.

Followed up by a De-FI product we call the Hypersphere. A 4-dimensional mathematical concept we have evolved after conversations with Computer Scientist, Dr. Samuel Buss, PhD. This application would allow universal interpolation of digital assets and non-custodial interest earnings for users.

Our expectation is to develop further applications that would allow for social financing via on chain interactions at low interest rates, called dLEND. This would allow global access to low-interest capital for user's education or home ownership.

Our first dAPP, dCOLLECT is a zero fee NFT markerplace that will allow the trading of our Historical NFTs and will be expanded to include live auctions of other artist's digital creations.

results.name: Crypto Kombat
results.description: Crypto Kombat is the first of its kind game on the Ethereum blockchain, where the heroes of the battles are influencers, developers, crypto-businessman
results.fullDescription:
Crypto Kombat is the first of its kind game on the Ethereum blockchain, where the heroes of the battles are influencers, famous developers, creators of crypto projects, exchanges, and entrepreneurs from the crypto space!

KOMBAT is an internal game's token. KOMBATs can be traded on exchanges as well as used in YeldFarming. 

KOMBATs can be staked in contract to receive rewards in VOMBATs. And VOMBAT is needed in order to mint NFT cards of your favorite heroes. Each crypto-hero card has 4 levels of a rarity - Genesis, Epic, Rare and Common. The last three types can be received by each player by accumulating the required number of VOMBATs. Genesis cards are issued in one copy and must be transferred to those who are depicted on them.

Elon Musk, Pavel Durov, Charlie Lee, Vitalik Buterin, and dozens of other heroes are waiting for you in Crypto Kombat! Game Hero сards can be transferred, exchanged, or traded on the OpenSea marketplace.

The gameplay will be reminiscent of the classic rock-paper-scissors, where players send their hero card to meet other players' cards, and by comparing the characteristics of Intelligence, Power, and Influence, they will compete with opponents with some random factors.

Join the growing active Crypto Kombat community! Our goal is to tell everyone in a playful way about the people who changed the world of cryptocurrencies and blockchain!

results.name: Mars Genesis
results.description: 10,000 UNIQUE collectible parcels of Mars, covering the entire planet, with proof of ownership stored on the blockchain.
results.fullDescription:
The Mars Genesis cards are "Non-Fungible Tokens" on Ethereum and ERC-721 standard that powers most digital art and collectibles.

No parcel has the same size or collection of attributes. Therefore, each has a different value. As a matter of fact, the topography, water data, temperature range, and colony conditions are accurate to the extent of human knowledge and from compiling state-of-the-art research.

Mars is finite. Therefore, once the 10,000 cards covering the planet are minted, the only way to acquire one is to purchase it from someone via the marketplace that is embedded in the blockchain. Via this market, you can buy, bid on, and offer cards for sale.

Each card represents a parcel of land on Mars with unique coordinates. These coordinates are part of the contract and define the unicity of a card. Therefore, and unlike any other NFT project, if for some obscure reasons, the IPFS (InterPlanetary File System) would go down, what makes your card unique and distinguishable would still live on the blockchain forever.

Each new card minted is generated randomly from the pool of remaining parcels. Prices start at 0.15 ETH and increase progressively to 0.5 ETH for the most expensive cards. For every trade on MarsGenesis marketplace, the first-owner of a card (minter) will receive a 4% royalty in perpetuity.

results.fullDescription:
DeFi Plaza is a low-cost exchange that offers best-in-class swapping costs for 120 pairs of the most traded DeFi tokens.

A highly integrated design enables the lowest gas costs in the industry combined with low swapping fees of 0.1% for all 120 trading pairs.

Fundamentally improved capital efficiency enables high trading volume per unit of liquidity resulting in a competitive offering to liquidity providers despite the low transaction fees.

results.name: Holdefi
results.description: Holdefi is a decentralized protocol powered by smart contracts that allows everyone to lend and borrow with their crypto assets.
results.fullDescription: Holdefi is a decentralized open-source non-custodial money market protocol where users can participate as depositors or borrowers. Depositors provide liquidity to the market to earn a passive income, and everyone can borrow from this liquidity and repay it after a while. The Borrower must add collateral before borrowing any tokens. The value of the collateral should be greater than the value of the assets they want to borrow. This collateral is, in fact, a guarantee that they will repay the borrowed assets.The Open-Zepplin and Peckshield team has audited Holdefi.

MetaOpus is born on the blockchain to ensure authenticity, ownership and grant access to new experiences. results.name: Index Coop
results.description: Index Coop is a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) that creates and maintains structured DeFi products and is governed by INDEX token holders.
results.fullDescription:
The Index Cooperative ("Index Coop") is a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) that creates and maintains structured DeFi products. These products are based on tokenized strategies that provide diversified exposure to different cryptocurrency and DeFi themes. All index products are always fully collateralized and redeemable for underlying assets at any time.

Index Coop offers a suite of sector index products, leveraged and inverse products, and yield generating products. These indices provide passive exposure to digital assets, making them potential tools for both retail and institutional investors. They include, for example, DeFi Pulse Index (DPI), Metaverse Index (MVI), Ethereum Flexible Leverage Index (ETH2x-FLI), Interest-compounding ETH Index (icETH), and more.

INDEX is an ERC-20 governance token built on Ethereum. As DAO participants, INDEX holders can vote on various decisions within the Index Cooperative ecosystem, including fees, new products, team composition, and treasury management. INDEX also allows users to a) mint and redeem products at will, b) provide input on the composition of indices, and c) have insight into the composition of different products.

results.name: MAIN
results.description: A new type of social media platform operated and owned by its users
results.fullDescription:
MAIN is a crypto social network owned and operated by its users.

Each community on the platform has its own coins that anybody can buy and sell. The price of coins goes up when people buy them and goes down when people sell.

On MAIN you can:

  • Do everything the same as in other social networks: make posts, comment, rate others users, create your own communities or join existing ones.
  • Get MAIN tokens for your activity on the platform or as rewards from other users. Tokens are distributed every day to all MAIN users.
  • Own communities right on the blockchain. You can buy and sell community coins, participate in voting and make money on community growth.
  • Withdraw tokens from the platform and exchange them for other cryptocurrencies.

results.name: Convex Finance
results.description: Convex allows Curve.fi liquidity providers to earn trading fees and claim boosted CRV without locking CRV themselves.
results.fullDescription:
Convex allows Curve.fi liquidity providers to earn trading fees and claim boosted CRV without locking CRV themselves. Liquidity providers can receive boosted CRV and liquidity mining rewards with minimal effort.

If you would like to stake CRV, Convex lets users receive trading fees as well as a share of boosted CRV received by liquidity providers. This allows for a better balance between liquidity providers and CRV stakers as well as better capital efficiency.

Convex has no withdrawal fees and minimal performance fees which is used to pay for gas and distributed to CVX stakers.

CRV stakers and liquidity providers also receive liquidity mining rewards in the form of CVX.

results.name: TrueFi
results.description: Earn high yields on stablecoin loans and borrow capital without collateral
results.fullDescription: TrustToken built the world’s just trusted stablecoins, most notably TUSD, backed 1:1 with live on-chain Proof of Reserve, and TrueFi, the world’s first collateral-free lending protocol powered by on-chain credit, and governed by TRU holders.

results.name: Integral
results.description: Integral introduces a novel decentralized exchange that allows every $1 of liquidity on Ethereum and Arbitrum to go much further than in a classic AMM.
results.fullDescription:
Integral introduces a novel exchange platform for decentralized finance, tailored to accommodate large trades on blockchain networks such as the Ethereum Mainnet and Arbitrum.

For traders, Integral supports all mainstream execution methods, including Time-Weighted Average Price (TWAP), instant atomic orders, and limit orders (testnet). Each method offers a strategic approach to minimize a large order's price impact and secure better pricing.

For liquidity providers, Integral functions as a capital-efficient DEX that emphasizes utilization. Its distinctive design ensures that LPs benefit from high capital efficiency, achieve mean-zero impermanent loss over time.

For aggregators and solvers, Integral offers competitive pricing and execution. The atomic layer of the protocol has been integrated with major aggregators, consistently handling high volumes from both sources on primary pairs such as WETH-USDC, WETH-USDT, and WBTC-WETH.

results.name: UMA
results.description: UMA stands for Universal Market Access. UMA is driven by a shared belief that financial markets should be free, open, and fair.
results.fullDescription:
UMA stands for Universal Market Access. UMA is driven by a shared belief that financial markets should be free, open, and fair. The economic freedom created by a free and open market enables everyone equal opportunity to pursue prosperity and build financial independence.

UMA's goal is to enable anyone to attain or transfer any form of risk seamlessly and securely through UMA protocol to empower everyone to participate in a universally accessible financial system.

results.name: Saddle Finance
results.description: Saddle is the easiest way to trade and earn with pegged value crypto assets, beginning with tokenized bitcoin.
results.fullDescription:
Saddle is the easiest way to trade and earn with pegged value crypto assets, beginning with tokenized bitcoin.

Saddle is an automated market maker optimized for trading between pegged value crypto assets.

Saddle is launching with a tokenized bitcoin pool, our first step towards unlocking deep on-chain liquidity.

Saddle is powered by StableSwap, a state of the art algorithm built in Solidity for trading pegged value crypto assets. Our smart contracts have been audited by firms like OpenZeppelin, Quantstamp, and Certik.

Saddle is built by DeFi natives with years of prior experience at Web2 companies like Uber, Amazon, and Square. As regular DeFi users ourselves, we’ve seen firsthand how important an active and vibrant community is for a project’s success. We know Web2, but we know Web3 better.

results.name: Polker
results.description: A blockchain-based, provably fair, online casino.
results.fullDescription:
POLKER (PKR) is the first blockchain online poker game that uses Unreal Engine 4 for immersive and powerful gameplay while utilizing a provably fair and TRNG system for truly transparent gameplay. PKR also uses patented and patent-pending technology that allows users to bet in dozens of cryptocurrencies without the need to convert their holdings to a single-supported cryptocurrency standard. The POLKER is designed to run on Substrate (Polkadot) with intended support for next-generation Virtual Reality with stunning 3D characters, visual effects, and environments.

Choose from 5 theme selections to start betting and winning different VFX to activate during your winning hands. Unlike other online poker games where it’s simple 2D gameplay with odd animation, Polker supports the realism that poker fans deserve with real-time 3D animation, stunning VFX, realistic environments, and a dashboard to interact with your friends and share winning videos! It’s poker the way you deserve to play in 2021!

results.name: Enzyme Finance
results.description: Enzyme Protocol is an Ethereum-based protocol for decentralized on-chain asset management.
results.fullDescription: Enzyme Protocol is an Ethereum-based protocol for decentralized on-chain asset management. It is a protocol for people or entities to manage their wealth & the wealth of others within a customizable and safe environment. Enzyme empowers anyone to set up, manage and invest in customized on-chain investment vehicles.

results.name: Mirror
results.description: Mirror is a DeFi protocol powered by smart contracts on the Terra network that enables the creation of synthetic assets called Mirrored Assets (mAssets)
results.fullDescription:
Mirror is a DeFi protocol powered by smart contracts on the Terra network that enables the creation of synthetic assets called Mirrored Assets (mAssets). mAssets mimic the price behavior of real-world assets and give traders anywhere in the world open access to price exposure without the burdens of owning or transacting real assets.

The minting of mAssets is decentralized and is undertaken by users throughout the network by opening a position and depositing collateral. Mirror ensures that there is always sufficient collateral within the protocol to cover mAssets, and also manages markets for mAssets by listing them on Terraswap against UST.

The Mirror Token (MIR) is minted by the protocol and distributed as a reward to reinforce behavior that secures the ecosystem. With it, Mirror ensures liquid mAsset markets by rewarding MIR to users who stake LP Tokens obtained through providing liquidity. Also to incentivize users to ensure mAssets to mimic the price behavior of real-world assets, users who stake sLP Tokens obtained through shorting mAssets are rewarded with MIR.MIR is valuable as it is can be staked to receive voting privileges and to earn a share of the protocol's CDP withdrawal fees.

Mirror is a project developed and steered by its community: its markets are maintained by its own users through MIR incentives, and the protocol evolves with new ideas through democratic governance.

results.name: LIDO
results.description: The Lido Ethereum Liquid Staking Protocol, built on Ethereum 2.0's Beacon chain, allows their users to earn staking rewards on the Beacon chain without locking
results.fullDescription:
The Lido Ethereum Liquid Staking Protocol, built on Ethereum 2.0's Beacon chain, allows their users to earn staking rewards on the Beacon chain without locking Ether or maintaining staking infrastructure.

Users can deposit Ether to the Lido smart contract and receive stETH tokens in return. The smart contract then stakes tokens with the DAO-picked node operators. Users' deposited funds are pooled by the DAO, node operators never have direct access to the users' assets.

Unlike staked ether, the stETH token is free from the limitations associated with a lack of liquidity and can be transferred at any time. The stETH token balance corresponds to the amount of Beacon chain Ether that the holder could withdraw if state transitions were enabled right now in the Ethereum 2.0 network.

results.name: H-Tokens
results.description: H-tokens are a suite of assets issued on Ethereum and backed by cryptocurrencies from other blockchains.
results.fullDescription: H-Tokens are standard ERC20 tokens with a 1: 1 ratio of mainstream crypto assets. While maintaining the same value, H-series assets also have the flexibility of Ethereum. H-Tokens serve as a bridge between the centralized market and the DeFi market, enabling users to participate in DeFi market investment conveniently and seamlessly, providing high-quality assets to the DeFi market, and promoting the prosperity of the entire DeFi market.

results.name: MelioraSwap
results.description: Meliora, Cross-chain Atomic Swaps, From wallet to wallet multichain, trust-less, permission-less and secure swaps
results.fullDescription: Meliora, Cross-chain Atomic Swaps, From wallet to wallet multichain, trust-less, permission-less and secure swaps

results.name: Quarashi Network
results.description: Quarashi consists of six built in modules: Multi Crypto Non-Custodial Wallet, DEX, Private Chat, VPN and Browser, IDO Launchpad, Airdrop & News & Top ICO
results.fullDescription: Quarashi Wallet is the #1 all in one crypto wallet that allows you to secure, manage, and exchange your favorite cryptocurrencies, like Ethereum, AAVE, Compound, Tether, and many more. Easy to use wallet, highly secure, and puts you in control of your wealth. Quarashi Network is a multi currency crypto wallet, next-generation platform for your cryptocurrency journey with Decentralized Blockchain UI Multi chain crypto wallet, Decentralized exchange, and privacy chat. Manage your wealth in a blockchain wallet that secures your assets and provides you complete control over them. - With Quarashi Multi Crypto Wallet you can swap: (ERC-20) Top 100 Crypto with Quarashi Token - Safely store and hold Top 100 Cryptocurrencies - Send/Receive Ethereum/Tokens - See and analyze price graphics per 24 h/week/month/year - Verification Transaction Hash - Sending Gas Limit Chooser - Receive Notification Quarashi network offers you a decentralized chat module, 100% anonymous, 100% privacy with no backups, and 100% encrypted. Unlike other apps, security and privacy is our top priority, so be sure your data is always protected. Track your cryptocurrencies portfolio with price graphics and analysis charts that update in real-time to keep up with the fast-moving market. Need to send or receive Ethereum? Send and receive of top 100 Crypto with the touch of a button using text address or QR codes. Forget about downloading a wallet for each digital asset and writing down a recovery phrase or private key for each. Store your top crypto-assets like Ethereum, Quarashi, AAVE, Compound, Tether (USDT), and many others in one wallet. Quarashi Wallet is a 100% secure Blockchain interface solution, simple to understand & easy-to-use & accessible to everyone. Your assets: private keys, funds are stored directly into the blockchain.
